titlestmt.subtitle: Finding Aid
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Elisha Winkler.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded in NoteTab Pro. Encoded by Deborah A. Richards. 2006-03-31

did.head: Collection Overview
did.abstract: This collection is in four folders and contains newspaper and magazine articles, pamphlets, and black and white photographs.

bioghist.p: Since 1985, Smith College has offered an engineering minor with concentrations in chemical, civil, and computer engineering. Between 1976 and 1991, Smith was partners with the University of Massachusetts in a dual engineering program. The Engineering Department was developed in 2000 and focuses on computer, electrical and environmental engineering.

scopecontent.p: The Engineering Department records, 1970s-2000s, contain materials describing the history and offerings of the department. Types of materials include newspaper and magazine articles about the development of the program, pamphlets about the department's courses, and black and white photographs of faculty and students.

userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. Permission to publish material from the documents must be requested from the Smith College Archives. Smith College owns copyright to any published material relating to college events and activities. Provenance and copyright ownership of other materials is unknown and researchers are responsible for determining any question of copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Smith College Dept. of Engineering Records, Box #, Smith College Archives.

acqinfo.p: The Engineering Department records were created by the departments and tranferred to the College Archives.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Researchers should also view: RG 42. Faculty
